normal.name: Housekeeper Guidance
normal.description: Deals fire damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemy

auto.name: Five Grains Harvest
auto.description: All allied units gain 36% attack power. Attack power cap: Cannot exceed 36% of Zashiki-warashi's entry attack power. Maximum 1 layer, lasts 15 seconds

ultimate.name: Share Fortune! Share Hardship!
ultimate.description: All friendly units damage dealt increases by 36%, lasts 15 seconds

passive.name: Child's Blessing
passive.description: After using auto skill: The allied unit with highest attack power gains one layer [Blessing]. [Blessing] Effect: Increases attack power by 60% for 15 seconds

teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
teamSkill.description: Team attack power increases by 10%. Team defense increases by 10%

awakenings.effect: After entering battle, all friendly units attack power increases by 15%, lasts 30 seconds
When using ultimate: Characters with [Blessing] additionally gain 15% damage increase
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
After using Auto skill: All allied units gain 10% critical rate for 5 seconds
When using ultimate: Characters with [Blessing] gain double ultimate effect

memoryCard.name: Sleep Treasure
effects: After casting ultimate skill, make team damage increase by 24%, lasts 10 seconds; additionally has 50% chance to make team critical damage additionally increase by 20%, lasts 10 seconds
